column4: hi, someone had problems with the lastest fglrx drivers version??
Does it only do this after updating the drivers?
if i use the ald drivers all work good
Well after updating to Edgy, gdm pretty much freezes for me, so I have to use kernel 2.6.15-23 from dapper
I recompiled the latest Edgy kernel and vanilla kernel, and both times It still freezes
is the Ubuntu loading screen gray distorted?
you may have an unrelated problem then
but I do have 2.6.15-23 with the latest ATI drivers and it works
ok, i'll try with other kernel
did you remember to disable the default ubuntu fglrx module?
